CustomField.description: Displays/stores the duration in minutes for which the service was not available.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND(NOT(AND(ISBLANK(BMCServiceDesk__Start_Date__c),ISBLANK(BMCServiceDesk__End_Date__c))), BMCServiceDesk__End_Date__c > BMCServiceDesk__Start_Date__c), ((BMCServiceDesk__End_Date__c - BMCServiceDesk__Start_Date__c) * 1440), IF(AND(ISBLANK(BMCServiceDesk__End_Date__c), NOT(ISBLANK(BMCServiceDesk__Start_Date__c)), NOW() > BMCServiceDesk__Start_Date__c), ((NOW() - BMCServiceDesk__Start_Date__c) * 1440), null ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays the duration in minutes for which the service was not available.
CustomField.label: Outage Duration
